content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to the current status or statistics of Boland or any specific startups or businesses operating in the region. However, in general, successful startups and businesses tend to be those that innovate in response to market needs, effectively manage resources and operations, and have a strong team and leadership. Boland's growing technology and renewable energy sectors may offer opportunities for startups that are focused on developing innovative solutions in these areas. Additionally, Boland's established wine industry also provides opportunities for startups that focus on wine technology or wine tourism. Without specific data, it's difficult to highlight any particular businesses, but it appears that Boland's diverse range of industries provides opportunities for startups and businesses to succeed in different areas.
